abstract.para: Roadside observations of non-native plant species along elevational gradients made by the Mountain Invasion Research Network (MIREN). See Alexander, J. M., C. Kueffer, C. C. Daehler, P. J. Edwards, A. Pauchard, T. Seipel, and MIREN Consortium. 2011. Assembly of nonnative floras along elevational gradients explained by directional ecological filtering. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences 108:656-661.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial (CC-BY-NC) 4.0 License.

gbif.citation: Mountain Invasion Research Network - MIREN_ETH. Mountain Invasion Research Network (MIREN) survey. Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/zd44yg accessed via GBIF.org on 2022-02-08.
